item.title: Group
item.description: I am interesed to supervise or collaborate the following research topics: Deep learning for wireless sensing and affective computing Transfer learning and domain adaptation for data-efficient sensing Multimodal learning for IoT applications The students are expected to have solid backgrounds on machine learning, deep learning and [wireless sensing]. Pytorch library is highly preferred in our research team. Please contact me if you are interested. Ph.
